windows.title: Hey Niklas, anything blocking you from enabling CoPilot? - firat.gomi@trilogy.com - DevFactory Mail - Pinned - High memory usage - 1.3 GB - Google Chrome - Firat (trilogy.com)

uiElements.details: Email interface with tabs for Inbox, Starred, Snoozed, Sent, Drafts, and more. Compose button visible. Search bar present.

content.title: Email Content
content.visibleText:
Hey Niklas, anything blocking you from enabling CoPilot?

Firat Gomi
Product Manager
firat.gomi@ignitetech.com

Hello Niklas,

This is Firat, Product Manager of Jive. Hope that all is well!

I wanted to reach you personally because I've seen that you haven't enabled CoPilot ever since the new update was launched in May. I was wondering if there was a reason holding that off, or if you don't mind to share the Redlines Docs on top of Ignite or capable of it?

I'd like to address your concerns and thoughts regarding CoPilot if you have any. Do you have 5 minutes for a chat? If not, you can also just shoot me your thoughts as a reply to this email. You can be as candid as possible.

If you weren't aware of the CoPilot launch yet, you can check this list of videos to learn more about it. You're also welcome to enable it via the system menu.

Besides that, let me know if I can help you in any way. I'd love to create a connection and help each other.

Best regards,
Firat

Firat Gomi | Product Manager

[IgniteTech logo]

Learn more at ignitetech.com/onthejive

content.title: Draft Email
content.visibleText:
Hello Niklas,

This is Firat, Product Manager of Jive. Hope that all is well!

I wanted to reach you personally because I've seen that the Enterprise Holding hasn't enabled CoPilot ever since it was launched in May. I was wondering if there was a reason holding that off, or if you don't mind to share the Redlines Docs on top of Ignite or capable of it?

I'd like to address your concerns and thoughts regarding CoPilot if you have any. Do you have 5 minutes for a chat? If not, you can also just shoot me your thoughts as a reply to this email. You can be as candid as possible.

If you weren't aware of the CoPilot launch yet, you can check this list of videos to learn more about it. You're also welcome to enable it via the system menu.

Besides that, let me know if I can help you in any way. I'd love to create a connection and help each other.

Best regards,
Firat

content.title: Email Content
content.visibleText:
Hey Niklas, anything blocking you from enabling CoPilot?

Firat Gomi
Product Manager at IgniteTech
firat.gomi@ignitetech.com

Hello Niklas,

This is Firat, Product Manager of Jive. Hope that all is well!

I wanted to reach you personally because I've seen that you haven't enabled CoPilot ever since the new feature launched in May. I was wondering if there was a reason holding that off, or if you hadn't noticed what the Reliance Docs icon at top right corner is capable of?

I'd like to address your concerns and thoughts regarding CoPilot if you have any. Do you have 5 minutes for a chat? Jive's mission is to help businesses optimize their communications.

If you weren't aware of the CoPilot launch yet, you can check this list of videos to learn more about it. You're also welcome to enable it via the system menu.

Besides that, let me know if I can help you in any way. I'd love to create a connection and help each other.

Best regards,
Firat

Firat Gomi | Product Manager

Learn more at ignitetech.com/onthejive

activitySummary: The user is actively engaged in email communication using Gmail. They are composing an email to a recipient named Niklas, discussing the CoPilot feature of Jive. The email content includes an introduction, a query about the recipient's experience with CoPilot, and an invitation to share feedback or schedule a chat. The user is also referencing a list of videos to help the recipient learn more about CoPilot.

In addition to email communication, the user is working with a Google Sheets document titled 'Jive Cloud CoPilot - Outreach'. The user is likely using this document to track and manage outreach efforts related to the CoPilot feature.

The user is utilizing Google Chrome as their primary web browser, with multiple tabs open. The active tabs include Gmail and Google Sheets, indicating that the user is multitasking between email communication and data management. The user is also seen navigating through their calendar, possibly to schedule meetings or manage their time effectively.
